thread.title: Happy customer
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Happy customer

author: Happy customer
title: Happy customer
text: Ordered the wrong size jacket & the exchange process couldn't have been easier, I changed my mind on the desired size twice after I placed the order & they where always happy to help, it's clear they wanted me to be happy. A very pleasant experience.
